about_the_game:
Dive into the weird and wonderful world of Big Crown: Showdown with this eye-popping digital art book! Feast your peepers on over 140 pages of artwork, from the earliest concept images to final in-game visuals and promotional shots. Find out more about the development of the game with some juicy developer comments and even get a sneak peek at some hidden bits and pieces from the Big Crown universe!

The Artbook will be found in your local Big Crown: Showdown folder. Please follow this link for more information: https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=6685-WAZN-5747
detailed_description:
Dive into the weird and wonderful world of Big Crown: Showdown with this eye-popping digital art book! Feast your peepers on over 140 pages of artwork, from the earliest concept images to final in-game visuals and promotional shots. Find out more about the development of the game with some juicy developer comments and even get a sneak peek at some hidden bits and pieces from the Big Crown universe!

The Artbook will be found in your local Big Crown: Showdown folder. Please follow this link for more information: https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=6685-WAZN-5747

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 233 MB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
